title: Refactor database schema to work with credential manager
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
*Necessary for completing #208*

The SQL database schema needs to be refactored to work with the credential manager.

- Remove Username, Domain, Password

Direct credential id assignments shouldn't be saved to the DB. These should be saved locally.

If they are saved to the db, it should be a pointer that specifies the kind of credential to be applied locally. A connection could have a shared credential that specifies "Production Domain Foo". A user would then assign some credential loca...
